Students from these schools attended the 2-hour rehearsal; East Kentwood, Allegan, Holland High, Grandville, Berrien Springs, Coloma, Caledonia, Wayland Saint Joseph and of the course the 15 singers from Fennville.

It was a great evening of learning, sharing techniques and helping each other become better singers for this great event.

A big shout out to Craneâ€™s Pie Pantry for donating donuts and cider for a break at the half-way point of the rehearsal. Not a donut was leftover!

Fennville High School students were welcoming and friendly to all of our visitors. Good luck to all the kids on December 7th at their MSVMA Regional Honor Choir concerts.
